title: Taliban suspends chess over gambling concerns
anomalies: The Taliban, a militant Islamic group known for their strict adherence to Islamic law and conservative values, are suspending chess due to gambling concerns. Gambling concerns being cited as the reason for suspending chess is unusual, as chess is typically considered a non-competitive, intellectual pursuit that does not involve betting or wagering.
